attributes.action: Stop our judges from paying out to offenders
attributes.additional_details: Lee Rigby case the offenders admitted to the crime so they should be punished not rewarded
attributes.background: We want this business of paying offenders as such the Lee Rigby and paedophikes that are cobnvicted from being able to sue for time served or as it is sometimes put wrongful arrest , justice system to do their job properly for all the people of these criminals  for atrocious acts they committed

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
